name: SPLODE (itch) (GlydeOut)
description:
Made in 72 hours for the BenBonk Game Jam #2

Theme: Limited Space

Avoid the big circles and try to stay alive as long as possible! Collect coins so you can purchase a temporary shield to stay alive longer. Be careful, your character gets bigger over time, causing there to be less and less space!

1.1 Patch notes:

Coins will no longer spawn along the edge of the screen.

Known issues:

The audio glitches on web build.
